 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָמַח‎</span> **verb** ==sprout, spring up== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְמַח‎</span>; Sir. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***spring or shine forth***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shining***, also ***sprout***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צמח‎</span> ***posterity***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽמַחבּֿוֺ‎</span> [[Lev.13.37|Lev 13:37]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְצָֽמְחוּ‎</span> consecutive [[Isa.44.4|Isa 44:4]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְמַח‎</span> [[Job.5.6|Job 5:6]], 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּצְמַחְנָה‎</span> [[Isa.42.9|Isa 42:9]], etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹמֵחַ‎</span> [[Exod.10.5|Exod 10:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוֺמֵחַ‎</span> [[Eccl.2.6|Eccl 2:6]] feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹמְחוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.41.6|Gen 41:6]]; [[Gen.41.23|Gen 41:23]] — ***sprout, spring up:*** 

**1.** of plants, trees, etc. [[Gen.2.5|Gen 2:5]]; [[Exod.10.5|Exod 10:5]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.41.6|Gen 41:6]]; [[Gen.41.23|Gen 41:23]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Ezek.17.6|Ezek 17:6]] (in figurative); once (late) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוֺמֵחַ עֵצִים‎</span> [[Eccl.2.6|Eccl 2:6]] ***wood sprouting with trees*** (full of growing trees); figurative of future ruler (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶמַח‎</span>) [[Zech.6.12|Zech 6:12]], posterity [[Isa.44.4|Isa 44:4]], compare [[Job.8.19|Job 8:19]], trouble(<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמָל‎</span>) [[Isa.5.6|Isa 5:6]],truth (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱמֶת‎</span>) [[Ps.85.12|Ps 85:12]], restoration (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרֻכָֽתְךָ‎</span>) [[Isa.58.8|Isa 58:8]], future events [[Isa.42.9|Isa 42:9]]. 

**2.** of hair [[Lev.13.37|Lev 13:37]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; compare **Pi\`el**). **Pi\`el** ***grow abunduntly***, always of hair; — Perfect 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִמֵּחַ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.7|Ezek 16:7]] (in figurative): ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצַמַּח‎</span> [[2Sam.10.5|2Sam 10:5]] = [[1Chr.19.5|1Chr 19:5]] (of beard); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְצַמֵּחַ‎</span> [[Judg.16.22|Judg 16:22]] (Samson's hair). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִצְמִיחָהּ‎</span> [[Isa.55.10|Isa 55:10]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַצְמִיחַ‎</span> [[2Sam.23.5|2Sam 23:5]]; [[Isa.61.1|Isa 61:1]]l, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּצְמַח‎</span> [[Gen.2.9|Gen 2:9]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַצְמִיחַ‎</span> [[Job.38.27|Job 38:27]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצְמִיחַ‎</span> [[Ps.104.14|Ps 104:14]]; [[Ps.147.8|Ps 147:8]] — 

**1.** ***cause to grow***, with accusative of plant, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Gen.2.9|Gen 2:9]]; [[Ps.104.14|Ps 104:14]], compare [[Job.38.27|Job 38:27]], with 2 accusative [[Ps.147.8|Ps 147:8]] ***who causeth mountains to sprout grass***; figurative, object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶמַח צְדָקָה‎</span> [[Jer.33.15|Jer 33:15]] ***horn*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶרֶן‎</span>) of Israel [[Ezek.29.21|Ezek 29:21]], of David [[Ps.132.17|Ps 132:17]] righteousness, etc. [[Isa.61.11|Isa 61:11]]b; compare also [[2Sam.23.5|2Sam 23:5]] (if interrogative, see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]; otherwise [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]); subject ground [[Gen.3.18|Gen 3:18]] compare [[Isa.61.11|Isa 61:11]]a (simile), [[Deut.29.22|Deut 29:22]] (object omitted); also (figurative) [[Isa.45.8|Isa 45:8]] (compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]]). 

**2.** of rain, ***cause*** the earth ***to sprout*** (absolute), [[Isa.55.10|Isa 55:10]].
